Entries.Mon: 小伙子，你今天好吗？我希望镇上一切顺利。^小姑娘，你今天好吗？我希望镇上一切顺利。
Entries.Tue: 你来的刚好！我刚熬了一壶茶，想来一杯吗？ [614]$3
Entries.Wed: 我的老朋友威利呢！下次见到他时，告诉他老亨利还好着呢！
Entries.Thu: 你好啊小伙子。^你好啊小姑娘。#$b#很高兴你为我的项目提供了帮助。$1
Entries.Fri: %馆长正在看报纸。#$b#啊~ 你好啊小伙子。^啊~ 你好啊小姑娘。#$b#你赶上了最新的消息，你听说过在蔚蓝海岸附近有美人鱼的踪影吗？$3
Entries.Sat: 在我年轻的时候，我相当了解垂钓者。$3#$b#噢~ 我抓到一些小东西了！#$b#我把它抓上来后再告诉你更多。$1
Entries.Sun: 别忘了对戈迪甜心打招呼，她喜欢被人关注。#$b#你知道金鱼可以活到43岁并且有很好的记忆吗？$1

Entries.Mon: ...$0#$b#*戈迪专心地看着你，好像她想记住你的脸一样。*$1
Entries.Thu: ...$0#$b#*戈迪游到玻璃上并给你吹了一个吻。*$4

Entries.6372001/t 1000 2100: 50s/20 49/Curator 16 46 3 farmer -100 -100 0 Goldie 15 46 0/skippable/pause 500/speak Curator "就这里了，戈迪。你为新家感到兴奋吗？$0"/pause 500/playSound dropItemInWater/speak Goldie "...$0#$b#...$1"/pause 500/emote Goldie 32/pause 500/playSound stoneStep/pause 500/jump Curator 3/emote Curator 28/pause 1500/textAboveHead Curator "我们的第一位客人！"/pause 500/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 16 52/faceDirection Curator 2/speak Curator "欢迎来到星露水族馆！$4"/pause 1500/move Curator 3 0 2/move Curator 0 3 2/move farmer 0 -1 0/speak Curator "你一定是威利告诉我的那个农夫！很高兴认识你！$0"/pause 500/speak Curator "是的，你的名声很高，小伙子！^是的，你的名声很高，小姑娘！$0"/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Curator "你愿意帮我个忙么？$3"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 1 true/move Curator -2 0 2 true/speak Curator "你可能已经注意到了，我们目前鱼有点短缺。$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Curator 0/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Curator "除非你把可爱的戈迪也算进去，哈？$1"/pause 500/playSound dropItemInWater/speak Goldie "...$1#$b#...$2/pause 500/faceDirection Curator 2 true/faceDirection farmer 1 true/speak Curator "我听说你钓鱼很在行。$0"/pause 500/emote Curator 28/speak Curator "也许你会考虑捐出一些你的捕获物给我们展示？$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Curator "你可以把它们放在这里，在柜台上。它们要花一天的时间才能适应新的栖息地。$0#$b#别担心，我们拥有最先进的技术能确保它们的健康。#$b#就像戈迪一样。$1"/playSound dropItemInWater/speak Goldie "...$2#$b#...$3"/pause 500/emote Goldie 20/pause 500/emote farmer 56/speak Curator "那真是太棒了，谢谢你！$4#$b#我们会把它们都记录下来。$0"/pause 1500/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/move farmer 0 1 2/textAboveHead Curator "还有一件事"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Curator "你可能在途中注意到了潜水艇，那是我们的礼品店！$0#$b#我们目前库存不多，但是随着展览的增加，我们的商品也将增加！$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end

Entries.6372003/t 1000 2100/i {{spacechase0.Json: 50s/20 49/Curator 15 47 2 farmer -100 -100 0 Goldie 15 46 0/skippable/pause 500/playSound stoneStep/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 16 52/speak Curator "Ah hello @!$0"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 500/move Curator 1 0 2/speak Curator "So what have you come to donate today?$1"/pause 500/showFrame farmer 15/pause 200/playSound fishSlap/addObject 16 47 {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Razor Trout}} 1/pause 100/showFrame farmer 12/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 3/move farmer -1 0 0/pause 200/jump Curator 4/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/emote Curator 16/pause 500/move Curator -1 0 2 true/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Curator "Oh no lad, that won't do!$6^Oh no lass, that won't do!$6"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Curator "I know this fish, it's the Razor Trout.$2#$b#It's an invasive species to this area...$5"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Curator "It also eats other fish!$0"/pause 200/jump farmer 5/pause 200/speak Goldie "...$0#$b#*Goldie looks scared*$7"/pause 500/emote Goldie 16/pause 500/speak Curator "I don't think the Aquarium is a place for such a fish...$2#$b#You better take it with you.$0"/move farmer 1 0 0/pause 500/showFrame farmer 15/pause 200/removeSprite 16 47/playSound pickUpItem/pause 200/showFrame farmer 12/pause 500/speak Curator "Don't feel bad lad, I'm sure you didn't mean any harm.^Don't feel bad lass, I'm sure you didn't mean any harm.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/end

Changes.LogName: Willy Chinese Legendary Fish Conversation Topics

Entries.AquariumDonated:Legend: Wow，“传奇鱼”真的是某种...？$0#$b#前几天我在水族馆看到了！$1
Entries.AquariumDonated:Crimsonfish: 你在水族馆看到过“猩红鱼”吗？$0#$b#水族馆的馆长告诉我，它是在我商店旁边的码头被抓住的！$1
Entries.AquariumDonated:Angler: 我在水族馆看到了“琵琶鱼”，它是在鹈鹕镇被捕捞的！$0
Entries.AquariumDonated:MutantCarp: 水族馆里的“变种鲤鱼”真是个怪物，你见过吗？$0
Entries.AquariumDonated:Glacierfish: 你最近去过水族馆吗？$0#$b#我看到他们在展出“冰川鱼”，多美啊！$1
Entries.AquariumDonated:Pufferchick: 我在水族馆的地下室里窥视着“河豚鸡鱼”。$0#$b#真是一个奇怪的生物。$0
Entries.AquariumCompletedCT: 你能相信水族馆已经完成了吗？$0#$b#真是个奇迹！$1

Entries.AquariumDonated:Pufferfish: Have you seen the 'Pufferfish' at the Aquarium?$0#$b#I love that thing!$1

Entries.AquariumDonated:Sandfish: I took Jas and Vincent on a trip to the Aquarium recently.$0#$b#It was a great education trip for the children. But I especially liked the 'Sandfish'. It was so cute!$1

Entries.AquariumDonated:Frog: Have you been to the Aquarium lately?$0#$b#I saw they have terrarium with a 'Frog', it looked lonely so I donated one of my pet frogs...$7#$b#So it could have a friend.$1

Entries.AquariumDonated:SuperCucumber: I saw that the Aquarium have a 'Super Cucumber' on display now.$0#$b#I believe it to be a peculiar type of the regular 'Sea Cucumber', it might possess arcane properties...$0#$b#%The Wizard seems lost in thought.
